LanguageData.VCE_Canola.label: ріпак
LanguageData.VCE_Canola.description: A bright-yellow flowering variety of the rapeseed, cultivated mainly for its oil-rich seed.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Canola, though not directly edible, can be very efficiently converted into chemfuel at a refinery.
